Constructor Detail

FormatUtilsTest

public FormatUtilsTest()
Method Detail

testFormatDistMain

public final void testFormatDistMain()
Tests main functionality of method FormatDist. Locale en_US is assumed, several distances are passed as an argument to test the different cases : in meter, kilometer, kilometer with an extra decimal, more than 1,000 km.

testFormatDistBelgianFormat

public final void testFormatDistBelgianFormat()
Tests the formatting when a European locale is used, in this case nl_BE.

testFormatDistRoundUp

public final void testFormatDistRoundUp()
Test if the distance is correctly rounded.

testFormatDistNeg

public final void testFormatDistNeg()
Tests if returned formatted distance is positive, even if the distance argument is negative.

testFormatSpeedMain

public final void testFormatSpeedMain()
Tests conversion of the speed from m/s to km/h and formatting of the speed : 1 decimal when speed is smaller than 10km/h no decimals when speed is bigger than 10 km/h Locale en_US is assumed.

skiptestFormatSpeedBelgianFormat

public final void skiptestFormatSpeedBelgianFormat()
Tests the formatting when a European locale is used, in this case nl_BE.

testFormatSpeedRound

public final void testFormatSpeedRound()
Test if the speed is correctly rounded.

testFormatSpeedNeg

public final void testFormatSpeedNeg()
Tests if returned formatted speed is positive, even if the speed argument is negative.
